translations: n．令人烦恼的事物；让人担忧的问题：指让人感到困扰、担忧或恐惧的事物。
· One of the bugbears of modern life is the traffic congestion.
现代生活中令人烦恼的问题之一是交通拥堵。

sentences.sentence: Turkey suffers from two other bugbears: inflation and a large current-account deficit.
sentences.translation: 土耳其还面临着其他两个难题：通货膨胀和高额的往来账户赤字。

sentences.sentence: Socrates used to call the opinions of the many by the name of Lamiae, bugbears to frighten children.
sentences.translation: 苏格拉底常常以拉弥亚之名，以吓唬孩子的妖怪之名称呼多数人的意见。

sentences.sentence: You will probably find it a relief to bring things out in the open - and far easier than being burdened by hidden bugbears.
sentences.translation: 或许，把一切都摊开后你将感到轻松，要比扛着那些隐藏的“妖魔鬼怪“远容易。
